verbs.description: Foreign secretary Boris Johnson [V: is] attempting to save the Iran nuclear deal known as the Joint Comprehensive Plan of Action ( JCPOA ) after Trump pulled the US away from the agreement .

[ARG0: Foreign secretary Boris Johnson] is [V: attempting] [ARG1: to save the Iran nuclear deal known as the Joint Comprehensive Plan of Action ( JCPOA )] [ARGM-TMP: after Trump pulled the US away from the agreement] .

Foreign secretary Boris Johnson is attempting to save [ARG1: the Iran nuclear deal] [V: known] [ARG2: as the Joint Comprehensive Plan of Action ( JCPOA )] after Trump pulled the US away from the agreement .

Foreign secretary Boris Johnson is attempting to save the Iran nuclear deal known as the Joint Comprehensive Plan of Action ( JCPOA ) after [ARG0: Trump] [V: pulled] [ARG1: the US] [ARG2: away from the agreement] .
